message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which we believe would greatly benefit you. Given its high value and quality, we're confident it's worth more than what others might be willing to pay. Considering its worth to you, we propose a price of $110 for this exceptional item. We believe this is a fair offer that respects both the value of the product and your budget. Please let us know if this works for you, and we'd be delighted to proceed with the transaction.
